name: Lilys & Maurice
description:
Lilys and Maurice is a game about Lilys, a child who like very kids, has thoughts about scary things and nightmares that live inside of their imagination.
Maurice is a creature living in Lilys's nightmare, with his big size, sharp teeths and long claws, awaiting for the child to come whenever Lilys is wandering in his own head.

the thing is, Lilys has a fun time going close to Maurice's world and communicate with the big fluffy monster. He wishes to explore his world and play with Maurice, helping him through his journey by communicating through portals.
Their worlds are full of mysteries and they have to help one another to see the full extent of them, because Lylis wishes not to erase Maurice's world, instead helping him explore his own world and vice-versa. That's why they work in tandem to share Lylis's headspace, allowing one to see what the other cannot.

During the game, the two friends will have to work in pair to move inside of their own world, playing with their respective positions and reveal hidden secrets and objects that can help the other progress.
